items.sentence: Tom went to the post office to send a package to Mary.
Tom wishes he could speak French as well as Mary does.
I\'m not saying this to hurt you, but it\'s the truth.
It\'s already eleven. It\'s high time you were in bed.
It\'s doubtful if we\'ll finish in time for Christmas.
Tom bumped into Mary the other day at the supermarket.
Tom caught Mary stealing money from the cash register.
Tom closed the door quietly and tiptoed into the room.
No one can force you to do anything against your will.
No one has been able to reach the top of the mountain.
No sooner had Tom turned on the TV than the fuse blew.
None of my children are able to communicate in French.
I can\'t imagine why Tom would do something like that.
I can\'t remember the last time I ate dinner with Tom.
I can\'t remember where I put the good sewing machine.
I can\'t remember whether I turned off the gas or not.
I can\'t see anything because the whole place is dark.
Let\'s not forget that Tom doesn\'t understand French.
I can\'t concentrate with all this commotion going on.
I don\'t intend to go to Boston with you this weekend.
